Room.Name: Redwood Giants
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking beneath giant redwood trees in the enchanted forest.
Room.LongDescription: The trees are the biggest you have ever seen, and disappear into the clouds above. The lowest branches are far overhead and form a canopy, filtering the sunlight during the day. Not far to the southwest you can see a rope bridge across a narrow chasm, and to the north are what appear to be even bigger redwood trees.
